metadata.title: CVE-2019-9211 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: There is a reachable assertion abort in the function write_long_string_missing_values() in data/sys-file-writer.c in libdata.a in GNU PSPP 1.2.0 that will lead to denial of service.

criterions.comment: pspp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-5').
